definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Nu 36:4 ram, ram's horn, cornet (Ph. [[יבל]] ram; cf. Di Le 25:10 Dl:Pr 124)—abs. [[יוֹבֵל]] Jos 6:5 + 7 t.; [[יׁבֵל]] Ex 19:13 + 13 t.; pl. [[יוֹבְלִים]] Jos 6:4 + 2 t.; [[יׁבְלִים]] Jos 6:13; —

ram, only in combin.: ´[[בִּמְשׁׂח בְּקֶרֶן הַיּ]] Jos 6:5 the ram's horn, as wind-instrument; so [[בלים]]([[ו]])[[י]]([[ה]])[[שׁוֹפרוֹת]] Jos 6:4, Jos 6:6, Jos 6:8, Jos 6:13 rams' horns (v. Benz:Archäpol. 276); [[יׁבֵל]] alone, [[בִּמְשׁׂח הַיּׁבֵל]] Ex 19:13 at the sounding of the ram ('s horn).

designation of 50th year, marked by blowing of cornets, AV ‘jubile’ (so NH [[יוֹבֵל]], Targum [[יובֵילָא]], as loan-word); orig. no doubt [[שְׁנַת הַיּוֹבֵל]] year of the ram ('s horn), as Le 25:13, Le 25:28, Le 25:40, Le 25:50, Le 25:52, Le 25:54 (all H), Le 27:17, Le 27:18, Le 27:23, Le 27:24 (all P), but then, without [[שׁנת]], as [[יוֹבֵל הִוא תִּהְיֶה לָכֶם]] Le 25:10 a ram ('s horn blowing) shall it be to you; so v:Le 25:11, v:Le 25:12, v:Le 25:15, v:Le 25:28, v:Le 25:30, v:Le 25:31, v:Le 25:33 (all H), Le 27:18, Nu 36:4 (both P).
